original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business and technology, responsible for aligning complex system configurations with evolving organizational needs. As a key player in our technical solutions team, you will leverage your keen business acumen and technical proficiency to ensure our systems accurately reflect and support our business processes. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging cutting-edge machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive efficiency and innovation.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across departments to understand business requirements, document them thoroughly using techniques like user stories and process flows, and translate them into effective system configurations.
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and implementing/testing new configurations.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools.
- Recommend and implement process improvements and system enhancements through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Proficiency in SQL for database querying and data analysis
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and their practical applications

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role blending business acumen and technical expertise, with a focus on system configuration and implementation
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical solutions
- Experience in working with and optimizing complex business processes and systems

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a strong understanding of the industry's unique challenges and opportunities
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks
- Agile project management tools and methodologies

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative manner, embracing change and adapting to evolving business needs
- Willingness to take on a hands-on, problem-solving approach to drive innovative solutions

Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between business strategy and technical execution, responsible for ensuring our systems and processes effectively support the evolving needs of our organization. As a technical solutions specialist, you will leverage your deep understanding of business operations and your proficiency in system configuration to drive efficiency, enhance user experiences, and unlock new opportunities for growth. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline processes and unlock new insights.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and translate them into robust system configurations.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and implementing/testing new configurations.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Proactively recommend and implement process improvements and system enhancements through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and optimization.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong working knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Proficiency in SQL for database querying, data analysis, and reporting
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and their practical applications in business optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that blends business acumen and technical expertise, with a proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical solutions
- Demonstrated ability to work with and optimize complex business processes and systems

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the industry's unique challenges and opportunities
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks
- Agile project management tools and methodologies

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative manner, embracing change and adapting to evolving business needs
- Proactive, hands-on approach to problem-solving and driving impactful solutions

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic bridge between business objectives and technical execution, responsible for aligning our systems and processes with the evolving needs of our organization. As a technical solutions specialist, you will leverage your deep understanding of business operations and your expertise in system configuration to drive efficiency, enhance user experiences, and unlock new opportunities for growth. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline processes, optimize workflows, and uncover valuable insights.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to gather comprehensive business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and translate them into robust system configurations that address their needs.
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications for our [mention specific system] backend, including creating and modifying data mappings, integrations, and implementing/testing new configurations to ensure seamless integration with business processes.
- Analyze existing data using advanced querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, providing actionable insights to drive strategic decision-making.
- Proactively recommend and implement process improvements and system enhancements through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices, continuously optimizing our solutions to meet evolving business needs.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions and gather feedback for further refinement.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance, optimization, and knowledge sharing.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders at all levels of the organization
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Extensive working knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language and its application in system configuration and integration
- Proficiency in SQL for advanced database querying, data analysis, and reporting
- In-depth understanding of machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and their practical applications in business optimization and decision-making

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a role that blends strategic business acumen and technical expertise, with a proven track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into effective technical solutions
- Demonstrated ability to work with and optimize mission-critical business processes and systems in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the industry's unique challenges and opportunities
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Advanced SQL and data analysis tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks
- Agile project management tools and methodologies

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on strategic problem-solving and driving impactful solutions
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative manner, embracing change and adapting to evolving business needs
- Proactive, thought-leadership approach to identifying and addressing complex business challenges through the innovative use of technology
